roleset.name: crowd together too much
roleset.note: OVERCROWDING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, crowd-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls spray-9.7-1-1. (from overcrowding.01-n)

OVERCROWDED-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. Comparison to crowd-v.01. Not sure if the separate arg0 is possible for the adjective. (from overcrowded.01-j)

role.descr: substance, crowd, that is overcrowding arg1

example.name: overcrowded-j: Arg1 only
example.text: I can see the argument that L 26,000 for say a family of six or eight is not going to be enough to both have [a large enough home]-1 PRO-1 to not be very overcrowded and have enough money to pay the utility bills and eat .

example.name: overcrowded-j: Args 1 & 2
example.text: The original kitchen was overcrowded with 2 islands.

example.name: overcrowding-n: with arg1
example.text: I heard overcrowding in jails is a problem too - especially since the rioting last summer .

example.name: overcrowding-n: args 0 and 1
example.text: the State is bankrupt from their overcrowding of prisons

example.name: overcrowding-n: Comics. args 1 and 2
example.text: The one that started it all for Marvel, this is still a great cover in its own right, despite its overcrowding with caption boxes and dialogue balloons.
example.arg: with caption boxes and dialogue balloons
